MAN.TITLE: erode
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Dilates image by using arbitrary structuring element

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Number of times erosion is applied.
Optional argument : Creates structuring element. Number of columns in the structuring element.
Optional argument : Creates structuring element. Number of rows in the structuring element.
Optional argument : Creates structuring element. Relative horizontal offset of the anchor point.
Optional argument : Creates structuring element. Relative vertical offset of the anchor point.

DESCRIPTION.P: erodeThe function erode the source image using a specified structuring element (B) that determines the shape of a pixel neighborhood over which the maximum is taken. by default it is a 3*3 rectangle.

The function supports the in-place mode when the source and destination pointers are the same. Erodation can be applied several times iterations parameter. Erodation on a color image means independent transformation of all the channels.
